MDX.DbDetails: item_properties i left join item_property i0 on i.property_id=i0.property_idwhere h_id item_id_m,propname,propvalue item_id_m,i0.prop_display_name propname,i.property_value propvalueand item_status!=278select %{data} from %{dbtable} where (org_id,item_id_m) IN (select * from(SELECT i.org_id,i.item_id_m FROM item i JOIN mac_10gbosadata m ON m.ProductBill=i.item_number JOIN pkg_mat pm ON m.sn=pm.mat_sn JOIN pkg p0 ON p0.pkg_id=pm.pkg_id WHERE %{where} LIMIT 0,1) as orgitem)

DbDetails.Data: i.item_id_m,pkg_sn 包装箱号,COUNT(*) 包装箱内产品数量
DbDetails.queryFormat: SELECT %{data} FROM pkg_mat pb JOIN mac_10gbosadata m ON m.SN=pb.mat_sn JOIN item i ON i.item_number=m.ProductBill JOIN pkg_pkg pg ON pb.pkg_id=pg.pkg_x_id JOIN pkg_pkg pc ON pg.pkg_id=pc.pkg_x_id join pkg c on pc.pkg_id=c.pkg_id where c.pkg_id=(SELECT pc.pkg_id FROM pkg_pkg pc JOIN pkg_pkg pg ON pc.pkg_x_id=pg.pkg_id JOIN pkg p0 ON pg.pkg_x_id=p0.pkg_id WHERE %{where} limit 0,1) GROUP BY c.pkg_id

DbDetails.Data: i.item_id_m,pkg_sn 包装袋号,COUNT(*) 包装袋内产品数量
DbDetails.queryFormat: SELECT %{data} FROM pkg_mat pb JOIN mac_10gbosadata m ON m.SN=pb.mat_sn JOIN item i ON i.item_number=m.ProductBill JOIN pkg_pkg pg ON pb.pkg_id=pg.pkg_x_id join pkg g on pg.pkg_id=g.pkg_id where g.pkg_id=(SELECT pg.pkg_id FROM pkg_pkg pg JOIN pkg p0 ON pg.pkg_x_id=p0.pkg_id WHERE %{where} limit 0,1) GROUP BY g.pkg_id

DbDetails.Data: i.item_id_m,pkg_sn 包装盒号,COUNT(*) 包装盒内产品数量
DbDetails.queryFormat: SELECT %{data} FROM pkg_mat pb JOIN mac_10gbosadata m ON m.SN=pb.mat_sn JOIN item i ON i.item_number=m.ProductBill join pkg p0 on pb.pkg_id=p0.pkg_id where %{where} GROUP BY p0.pkg_id
SELECT i.item_id_m FROM pkg_mat pb JOIN mac_10gbosadata m ON m.SN=pb.mat_sn JOIN item i ON i.item_number=m.ProductBill join pkg p0 on pb.pkg_id=p0.pkg_id where %{where} GROUP BY p0.pkg_id
SELECT %{data} FROM pkg_mat pb JOIN mac_10gbosadata m ON m.SN=pb.mat_sn JOIN item i ON i.item_number=m.ProductBill join pkg p0 on pb.pkg_id=p0.pkg_id where %{where} GROUP BY p0.pkg_id
SELECT i.item_id_m FROM pkg_mat pb JOIN mac_10gbosadata m ON m.SN=pb.mat_sn JOIN item i ON i.item_number=m.ProductBill join pkg p0 on pb.pkg_id=p0.pkg_id where %{where} GROUP BY p0.pkg_id

DbDetails.DbTable: item i JOIN mac_10gbosadata m ON m.ProductBill=i.item_number JOIN pkg_mat p ON m.sn=p.mat_sn left join bosa.pkg p0 on p.pkg_id=p0.pkg_id
